artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Takekawa Seikichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; soldiers in snow wearing black coats with hoods; soldier at center on horse, which wears a tan, black and red blanket; standing soldiers with swords; sheets mounted on board
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Landing and Advancing toward Weihaiwei
